snippet: For multiple reasons several shows meant for Broadway’s 2012-13 season have been delayed or canceled.
abstract: Several shows meant for Broadway’s 2012-13 season have been delayed or canceled for variety of reasons, ranging from lack of investors to scheduling conflicts.
lead_paragraph: For multiple reasons several shows meant for Broadway’s 2012-13 season have been delayed or canceled.

headline.seo: For Some Shows, Path to Broadway Is Pockmarked
headline.main: On Their Way to Broadway, Eventually. Maybe.
headline.print_headline: On Their Way to Broadway, Eventually. Maybe.
